name: A decayed yellow cloak
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users physical resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'tumble'.
